page.title: 07SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: The villagers of Hallen have formed a preservation society mainly due to the opening of two rubbish tips in the area. A total of 300 rubbish carriers per day are using a road that was not meant for such heavyweight vehicles and which runs through the centre of Hallen village. Add to this traffic frequent oil tankers and heavy goods lorries to Avonmouth and there is real cause for concern. However, it should be mentiioned that the rubbish tips are being filled in and with landscaping they should look quite pleasant when finished.
